original_title: Lankadeepa clinches Most Popular Newspaper award again
original_body_lines: Our sister papers Daily Lankadeepa and the Sunday Lankadeepa won the 'Most Popular Newspaper' award for the 18th consecutive year at the ‘SLIM- KANTAR Peoples Award 2024’ being held at the Monarch Imperial, Sri Jayawardenapura Kotte.
The awards ceremony was organised by the Sri Lanka Institute of Marketing (SLIM) together with Kantar, Sri Lanka.
Janaka Rathnakumara, the Chief Operating Officer of Wijeya Group of Companies, Ajantha Kumara Agalakada, Editor of the Daily Lankadeepa and various sectional heads of Wijeya Newspapers at the event.
